param.name: files_to_import
param.label: Choose Files/Directories to Import
param.help: Select files and directories to import from CloudStor.

tool.help:
This tool allows you to import one or more files or directories from a registered `AARNET Cloudstor`_ account. |logo_image|
.. |logo_image| image:: https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a9/AARNet_logo.svg/220px-AARNet_logo.svg.png :width: 128px
Firstly you will need to configure access to the target Cloudstor account. Best practice is to setup an app specific password in Cloudstor for Galaxy to use. Click `here for instructions`_.
Next, in Galaxy, go to your profile settings under the User menu -> Preferences -> Manage Information, where you will need to set OwnCloud/Cloudstor Credentials.
.. image:: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/usegalaxy-au/Galaxy-Owncloud-Integration/master/Galaxy_OwncloudImportExport/images/galaxy_cloudstor_profile.png
1. Server URL: https://cloudstor.aarnet.edu.au/plus/remote.php/webdav 2. Username: The email your account is registered with 3. Password: Copied from the App password set up at Cloudstor
If the details above are configured properly, the next time you load this tool, the files and directories in your CloudStor account will be displayed. Select the files or directory you want to Import and press Execute.
.. class:: warningmark
**CAUTION** Your Cloudstor credentials will be stored on this server. While reasonable efforts have been made to store these credentials safely, you must be aware and accept the risks of storing these credentials. In the event that the server is compromised, it may be possible for an attacker to gain access to your Cloudstor account.
.. _AARNET Cloudstor: https://www.aarnet.edu.au/network-and-services/cloud-services/cloudstor/ .. _here for instructions: https://support.aarnet.edu.au/hc/en-us/articles/236034707-How-do-I-manage-change-my-passwords-
